articles.author: JAMEL VALENCIA | The National Desk
articles.title: Body of American teen pulled from snow after avalanche near Swiss resort - KOMO News
articles.description: An American and others were pulled out of the snow following an avalanche near a Swiss resort.
articles.content:
GENEVA (TND) An American and others were pulled out of the snow following an avalanche near a Swiss resort.
Authorities said a 15-year-old American boy was among three people who died off of the ski… [+509 chars]
